phrases: That she-gorilla who wears shorts year-round?
My mom said that vitamin C's good for colds.
I-It is not like I have a cold!
You are not a gorilla, Tsubaki.
I was cramming all through winter break.
Maybe I will try for a lower-ranked school.
National Unified Junior High Mock Exam Entrance Exam Results - By School
You can do it if you try, Tsubaki!
I am going to go brag to him!
Where do you think you are going?
I will only be a third wheel!
Hey, you, just because you made it through the prelims,
do not think you can afford to get cocky and loiter here!
You are the one who told me to stop by!
This one girl said she is going to an all-girls school.
I guess all-girls schools are kind of glamorous, huh?
I do not know about that.
Well, you would fit right in, Kaori-chan!
A girl who likes my best friend.
I am a voyeur, and a substitute, and a baggage handler,
and a pianist, and an accompanist, and...
Your mom's going to blow a fuse.
I am going to do whatever it takes so that she will let me keep her.
My mom likes animals, too, you know.
I bet it will be okay.
If you do not dry yourself off, you will catch a cold!
I could not find Chelsea anywhere.
Not at the junkyard or under the bridge...
If she is out here in this cold...
Even though I could not say a word, and I knew that my mom would get rid of her,
Chelsea still might have survived, but...
I am just a soulless puppet that my mother created.
That is not true, you do have a soul.
You have got all these good qualities - a ton!
Like right now, you are running around like your life depended on it.
Is not that because you regret it?
Because you want to tell Chelsea you are sorry?
You do too have a soul, Kousei.
It is just that you are good at hiding it.
So good, you cannot even find it yourself.
So I am going to find it for you.
So you will not lose your way, so you will not have regrets...
I will stay by your side forever.
After all, I know everything there is to know about you.
She orders me to check in with her regularly,
then she says if I have time to go, I should practice.
Watari came to see Kao-chan, too?
Looks like it is going to rain.
Let us head home today, huh?
I wish it would just snow instead.
You would only wish that until it piled up.
If the snow had its own flavor, we would have world peace, huh?
If our tap water was lemonade, it would eradicate the common cold.
Suddenly having to take shelter from the rain.
That is a cute handkerchief you are using, Tsubaki.
A boy right next to me.
You are like a girl, Tsubaki.
So you are a girl, Tsubaki.
I know you did not want to.
Well, I did not think we should get in their way.
When it could just be the two of them.
It hurts to see Kao-chan and Watari laughing together.
That is why you are avoiding her.
I can tell right away when you are holding back.
Just like you stayed by my side, I want to stay by yours.
I can read you like a book, Kousei.
The moment I met him, my life changed.
Everything I saw, everything I heard, everything I felt... all the scenery around me...
It started to take on color.
As if she would ever give you a second look!
When it comes to girls, if you are up against Watari,
you do not have a snowball's chance in hell!
You said you would stay by my side.
I can tell right away when you are holding back.
You do not know the first thing about me,
You have never once thought of me as a girl.
How is that for taking the plunge?
I made him see me as a girl!
I went through a lot of suffering.
Suffer, suffer, suffer, and think about me constantly!
But what is going to happen now?
The rain in winter feels so good.
Do not you have a cold?
I just got caught in the rain.
Do not worry about me, just pitch.
You are going to chase them down, okay?
Did something happen between you and Arima?
It is your fault for saying something freaky like that!
You were so aiming for the music room...
I just gave Kousei a good kick.
Come to think of it, he was limping.
Suffer some more for all I care!
No way am I ever going to show up to root for you again!
Think about me more, dummy Kousei!
And you... have no choice but to...
What was that all about, I wonder?
She was just messing around, right?
But for Tsubaki to make that kind of joke...
He is like a kid brother.
Are you into this or not?
You do not have much time before the finals in February!
What a cop-out of a performance.
You are up against top talents loaded with grit and passion.
Whether you will be going on to high school here, or leaving the country,
how you do in this competition will decide your future as a pianist.
Better man up, you are standing at the crossroads.
You do not have to come to the hospital anymore.
The final's coming up soon, right?
If you have time to come here, you should go over the sheet music.
Pound even one more phrase into your head!
She is the one who told me to check in regularly!
Maybe I should not have eaten that chocolate bar at the hospital.
And I do not say anything when I am there.
Maybe I pissed her off by talking about Aiza-san?
If I stop checking in... then I will not have a reason to see you anymore.
There is a plane in the sky!
Wow, the sky's connected, then, huh?
The plane crosses the sea of stars.
Like a cat, you silently creep up to me.
You told me not to come to the hospital.
But I did not say I would not call you.
It is flying really low, even though it is night.
She bombards me from an unexpected angle.
I am dumbfounded, always following you.
I told you, you do not have to.
You know you do not have the time.
It is not about the time.
A lump of steel, like a shooting star.
Just seeing the same sky as you makes familiar scenery look different.
I swing between hope and despair at your slightest gesture,
and my heart starts to play a melody.
What kind of feeling is this again?
What do they call this kind of feeling?
I am sure this is what they call love.
Well, it is a sports scholarship, so no surprises there.
They told me to report to the soccer team starting in March.
It is the bottom of the heap all over again.
You hated it whenever I asked you to come with me to see her.
Whenever I compare myself to Watari, I always get depressed.
Hey, so you are finally going to duke it out with me, huh?
The doctor will be here soon, all right?
Ms. Miyazono, are you with me?
You will get better in no time, okay?
Take a deep breath, Ms. Miyazono!
Ms. Miyazono, can you hear me?!
He was pretty much beyond saving when he got hit.
Do you think you will be able to forget?
Your hands are happy to be touching mine.
I am glad it is you.
